Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes the use of certain park lands for any school purposes
Summary: Authorizes the use of certain park lands alienated from a portion of the park commonly known as Lincoln Park, in the city of Albany for any school purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 885 of the laws of 1953 authorizing the city of Albany to discontinue the use of certain park lands for the purpose of using such lands for public school purposes, in relation to authorizing the use of such lands for any school purposes
